titles.title: Who Is He in Yonder Stall

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}'Tis the Lord, O wondrous story! 'Tis the Lord, the King of glory! At his feet we humbly fall, crown him, crown him, Lord of all!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who is He in yonder stall, At whose feet the shepherds fall? Who is he in deep distress, fasting in the wilderness?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who is he the people bless for his words of gentleness? Who is he to whom they bring all the sick and sorrowing?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who is he that stands and weeps at the grave where Lazarus sleeps? Who is he the gath'ring throng greet with loud triumphant song?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lo! at midnight, who is he prays in dark Gethsemane? Who is he upon the tree dies in grief and agony?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who is he that from the grave comes to heal and help and save? Who is he that from his throne rules thro' all the world alone?{/lang-eng}
